Class ApplicantUI

java.lang.Object
main.boundary.ApplicantUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
PasswordChanger
public class ApplicantUI extends Object implements PasswordChanger
Boundary class for Applicant user interface. Handles all user interactions for applicants in the BTO Management System. Uses project name as the unique project identifier.

  • Method Details

    • applicantUI

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(User user)
      Initiates the password change process for the specified user.

      This method delegates the password change workflow to the default implementation provided by the PasswordChanger interface, utilizing the configured passwordService and passwordUI components for validation and user interaction.

      Parameters:
      user - the User whose password is to be changed
